item.title: Comment on Hello world! by A WordPress Commenter
item.dc:creator: A WordPress Commenter
item.description: Hi, this is a comment. To get started with moderating, editing, and deleting comments, please visit the Comments screen in the dashboard. Commenter avatars come from <a href="https://en.gravatar.com/">Gravatar</a>.
item.content:encoded:
Hi, this is a comment.
To get started with moderating, editing, and deleting comments, please visit the Comments screen in the dashboard.
Commenter avatars come from Gravatar.

item.title: Comment on Downtown apartment by amberdemo
item.dc:creator: amberdemo
item.description: The flat was very clean and perfectly in line with the pictures, close to arsenal station and very quiet. We will return definitely.
item.content:encoded: The flat was very clean and perfectly in line with the pictures, close to arsenal station and very quiet. We will return definitely.

item.title: Comment on Sunny Dorm in West Town Left Sidebar by amberdemo
item.dc:creator: amberdemo
item.description: The room was very comfortable, the shower pressure and heat was perfect, the bathroom very clean. The view from their back deck was the highlight for us- and they were very kind to share the view! We enjoyed some wine and Turkish sweets on the deck for our last night. Additionally, the neighborhood is perfect!! Every corner there is a bar or restaurant or someone squeezing fresh juice for you. I would highly recommend this place!
item.content:encoded: The room was very comfortable, the shower pressure and heat was perfect, the bathroom very clean. The view from their back deck was the highlight for us- and they were very kind to share the view! We enjoyed some wine and Turkish sweets on the deck for our last night. Additionally, the neighborhood is perfect!! Every corner there is a bar or restaurant or someone squeezing fresh juice for you. I would highly recommend this place!

item.title: Comment on Sunny 2 Bedrooms Video by amberdemo
item.dc:creator: amberdemo
item.description: My stay with Paul and Yvonne was quite nice. They were extremely welcoming and helpful, providing tons of information about their neighborhood and Istanbul in general. I would stay with them again, and hope to do so. Delightful people!
item.content:encoded: My stay with Paul and Yvonne was quite nice. They were extremely welcoming and helpful, providing tons of information about their neighborhood and Istanbul in general. I would stay with them again, and hope to do so. Delightful people!

item.title: Comment on Chic Cole Valley House by amberdemo
item.dc:creator: amberdemo
item.description: Few other considerations are in order: 1. The location is mediocre at best. Finding their place is a challenge; more importantly, its hillside location is hard on the legs, no matter who you are. Yes, it sits in a trendy, less touristy neighborhood, but the upcoming Karakoy district is also trendy, closer to the museums and the water,and a much, much easier walk. 2. The guest bed is not very comfortable and should be replaced. 3. While their rates are reasonable, an astute shopper will find a lot of 3 and 4 star Istanbul hotels in that same price range.
item.content:encoded: Few other considerations are in order: 1. The location is mediocre at best. Finding their place is a challenge; more importantly, its hillside location is hard on the legs, no matter who you are. Yes, it sits in a trendy, less touristy neighborhood, but the upcoming Karakoy district is also trendy, closer to the museums and the water,and a much, much easier walk. 2. The guest bed is not very comfortable and should be replaced. 3. While their rates are reasonable, an astute shopper will find a lot of 3 and 4 star Istanbul hotels in that same price range.

item.title: Comment on Cozy House In The Sunnyside by amberdemo
item.dc:creator: amberdemo
item.description: Their flat is beautiful and comfortable, and the set-up with private bathroom is excellent. Their neighborhood has loads of lovely cafes and restaurant within easy walking distance. I wish I could have stayed longer. If they are free, I would love to stay with them when next visiting Istanbul. YOU SHOULD STAY HERE. I cannot recommend their place highly enough.
item.content:encoded: Their flat is beautiful and comfortable, and the set-up with private bathroom is excellent. Their neighborhood has loads of lovely cafes and restaurant within easy walking distance. I wish I could have stayed longer. If they are free, I would love to stay with them when next visiting Istanbul. YOU SHOULD STAY HERE. I cannot recommend their place highly enough.

item.title: Comment on Best Beaches For Holiday by Laura
item.dc:creator: Laura
item.description: WP Rentals can benefit both hosts and travelers. Hosts get to meet people from around the world while making a little extra money, and travelers can often stay for less than the cost of a hotel room. In addition, many travelers enjoy accommodations that offer a different experience from standard hotels.
item.content:encoded: WP Rentals can benefit both hosts and travelers. Hosts get to meet people from around the world while making a little extra money, and travelers can often stay for less than the cost of a hotel room. In addition, many travelers enjoy accommodations that offer a different experience from standard hotels.

item.title: Comment on 10 Best September Vacations by Gina
item.dc:creator: Gina
item.description: In the past, these types of services have been used largely by thrifty tourists looking for the cheapest place they can find in a particular city. Now, however, more and more business travelers and professionals are looking to WP Rentals for a unique and memorable experience.
item.content:encoded: In the past, these types of services have been used largely by thrifty tourists looking for the cheapest place they can find in a particular city. Now, however, more and more business travelers and professionals are looking to WP Rentals for a unique and memorable experience.

item.title: Comment on Offering a Welcoming Space by Simone
item.dc:creator: Simone
item.description:
In reply to <a href="./../../2015/04/21/offering-a-welcoming-space/index.html#comment-13">Laura</a>.
We want the 2015 WP Rentals to inspire, equip, and celebrate you. And we want to gather with the host community to learn how to do what we do better. Let’s make this year’s summit one to remember! Stay tuned as we reveal exciting details in the days to come.
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Laura.

We want the 2015 WP Rentals to inspire, equip, and celebrate you. And we want to gather with the host community to learn how to do what we do better. Let’s make this year’s summit one to remember! Stay tuned as we reveal exciting details in the days to come.
